text: Beatrice Geraldine Hill-Lowe was an archer from Ireland. She was born on 26 January 1868 and died on 2 July 1951. Hill-Lowe competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics.Beatrice Hill-LoweBeatrice Geraldine HILL-LOWE == References == Category:1869 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Irish sportspeople Category:British archers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Great Britain
title: Beatrice Hill-Lowe
